backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend for the ICP application.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five features related to UI improvements, audio additions, and flow changes in the RV journey experience components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components describing the RV journey experience with single break stop, water-themed activities, and interactive driver-view scenes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, including warm desert/road-trip palette and custom border/shadow utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tags and a title describing an interactive RV driver-view website with 3 checkpoints.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the RVExperience component within a full-height container.
frontend/src/components/rv/ActionPlaybac: Empty file placeholder for action playback component (content truncated or not yet implemented).
frontend/src/components/rv/AnimatedTrave: Component that crossfades through four scene images with Ken Burns animations every 20 seconds as a fallback when video cannot play.
frontend/src/components/rv/BreakStopReac: Modal overlay announcing arrival at a break stop with badge, RV icon animation, and continue button, playing a sound effect on mount.
frontend/src/components/rv/CampfireEndSc: Celebratory overlay shown upon reaching the campfire destination, displaying RV badge earned message with flame animations and campfire arrival sound effect.
frontend/src/components/rv/CheckpointOve: Empty file placeholder for checkpoint overlay component (content truncated or not yet implemented).
frontend/src/components/rv/checkpoints.t: Defines checkpoint data structures and exports three checkpoints (Rest Stop, Scenic Overlook, Campground) with various actions that consume different amounts of water resources.
frontend/src/components/rv/ClickToContin: Full-screen clickable overlay with a pulsing continue button that plays ambient sound effect when clicked to advance the journey.
frontend/src/components/rv/JourneyHaltIs: Dramatic failure overlay with animated visual indicators and a multiple-choice quiz to identify the correct issue (water tank empty), playing multiple sound effects and providing inline feedback for wrong answers.
frontend/src/components/rv/ProgressIndic: Displays a progress bar and status indicator for the RV journey, showing current state (traveling, break stop, halted, etc.) with visual badges and progress percentage based on flow state.
frontend/src/components/rv/RVBadgeCelebr: Shows a celebration overlay when the RV badge is earned, with animated award icon and a button to continue to the destination, playing a celebration sound effect on mount.
Main orchestrator component for the RV journey experience that manages flow state transitions, renders appropriate scenes (start, traveling, break stops, halt issues, destination), and handles audio effects. Includes auto-advance logic for certain states and guards against duplicate triggers.
frontend/src/components/rv/scenes.ts: Exports scene data arrays for different RV journey backgrounds (morning, sunset, rain, night) plus special scenes for halt issues and campfire destinations.
frontend/src/components/rv/StartJourneyS: Initial screen that introduces the RV journey adventure with overview details (1 break stop, driver perspective, limited visibility) and a start button that plays ambient sound when clicked.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelScene.t: Renders a static travel scene with a background image, gradient overlay, and bottom-left info card displaying the scene title and description.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelTransit: Displays a loading transition screen between journey segments with a spinner, status message indicating whether continuing or arriving at destination, and plays transition sound effect.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelVideoSc: Manages video playback for traveling segments with health monitoring (stall detection, playback timeout), automatically falling back to AnimatedTravelFallback if video fails to play or stalls repeatedly. Handles timer-based or user-triggered advancement.
React component displaying a journey completion screen with summary stats, a restart button, and a footer with attribution to caffeine.ai. Plays a campfire arrival sound effect on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor using Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRVFlow.ts: Custom hook managing the RV journey flow state machine with transitions between start, traveling, break stops, halt issues, celebration, destination, and completion states.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.ts: React hook for managing HTML5 audio playback with configurable volume and loop options, providing play and stop controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm desert/road-trip color palette using OKLCH color space, plus text shadow utilities and dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors (using OKLCH), border radius variables, warm shadows, and custom animations for accordions, fades, and slides.
project_state.json: Project state tracking five feature requests related to fixing duplicate text, adjusting road image transition timing to 20 seconds, adding comprehensive audio effects, and restoring road scenes with click-anywhere interaction after breakpoint and issue overlays.
